Package uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.federatedstore.operation

Interface IFederationOperation

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable, Operation
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AddGraph, AddGraphWithHooks, ChangeGraphAccess, ChangeGraphId, FederatedOperation, GetAllGraphIds, GetAllGraphInfo, RemoveGraph, RemoveGraphAndDeleteAllData
    public interface IFederationOperation
extends Operation
    IFederationOperation interface is for special operations used to configure/manipulate/control federation. It has no intended function outside of federation and should only be handled by the FederatedStore.
